channel.title: Change starting point and where you go when dead
channel.description: Anybody tell me how to change where you start off and where you go when you die??

item.title: Change starting point and where you go when dead
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

first off the one in player.java is only for the first log in the oneâ€™s in client.java are for respawn locations

search for the coords that you go when you die and change them all

item.title: Change starting point and where you go when dead
item.dc:creator: @muskiejk muskiejk
item.description:
@muskiejk wrote:

ok first go into player.java and scroll down past the player look and all that till u find something like xcoords and y coords change those to wherever you want the starting point to b also there is more coords i think after that and change them to where you want the guy to go when he dies its pretty easy =)
